rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The hall is designed to welcome guests and provide a transitional space.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with a kitchen space to promote social interaction. The layout supports the Bohemian style aesthetic with eclectic design elements.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Designed for efficiency and culinary creativity, featuring Bohemian decorative elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony to the West for scenic views and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed to maintain privacy and comfort. Suitable for family members or guests.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring ample space for a three-bedroom layout.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom attached to the master bedroom for privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom designed for guests' use, ensuring convenience for visitors.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space dedicated to storage and additional utility functions including laundry facilities.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Window on the West side of master bedroom balcony for natural light and scenic views.
Large windows in living room to enhance natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu for prosperity.
Windowed section in the kitchen to provide natural lighting and ventilation, with Bohemian style decor.

levels.notes: The design integrates local Indian residential norms with Vastu principles ensuring a harmonious living environment. The corner plot positioning is leveraged by placing the North-facing entrance to harness positive energy and the West-facing balcony for scenic views. The open-plan kitchen and living area encourage social interaction and enhance the Bohemian aesthetic.
